Question
========
What is the recommended approach for large files in GitHub repositories?

Answerlist
----------
* Keep all large files in the repository so the full history is preserved
* Zip large files and commit them regularly
* Push files larger than 100 MB and let GitHub handle them
* Keep large files out of the repository and store them elsewhere

Solution
========
Large files slow down or break GitHub workflows, so keep them out of the repository and use other storage.
